nodes.text: Valashar was a terrestrial astronomical object in the galaxy, known for mining. Some time around 34 ABY, a mining colony on Valashar ordered a phase connector from the Office of Acquisitions on the Colossus, a refueling platform on the planet Castilon. The Keteerian Teroj Kee attempted to steal the phase connector for the First Order, claiming that he was with the Mining Guild, and Kazuda Xiono, who had been working in Acquisitions, was forced to destroy the device.
Valashar was first mentioned in "Dangerous Business," an episode of the television series Star Wars Resistance, which aired on January 20, 2019.
